techmeme.title: Apple says iOS 18 will let users record and transcribe phone calls, and call participants will be automatically notified that they're being recorded (Emma Roth/The Verge)
Fortinet announces it has reached an agreement to acquire cloud security company Lacework; Lacework had raised $1.8B and was valued at $8.3B in 2021 (Kyle Alspach/CRN)
During an interview, Craig Federighi says Apple looks forward to "doing integrations" with other AI models, including Google Gemini, "in the future" (Chance Miller/9to5Mac)
Apple introduces Messages via satellite on iOS 18, letting users send texts without a Wi-Fi or cellular connection, available on the iPhone 14 or later (Juli Clover/MacRumors)
Thoughts on Apple Intelligence's ability to outsource compute to Apple's servers with cryptographic guarantees of privacy, prompt injection risks, and more (Simon Willison/Simon Willison's Weblog)
